title: If You've Ever Looked For Faces In Your Potato Chips, Thank Myrtle Young
teaser: The Potato Chip Lady, aka Myrtle Young, died in August of this year. She was 90. Young became famous after showing her collection of unusually shaped chips to Tonight Show host Johnny Carson in 1987.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
